ygData.msgSnippet: Sinesis waits. Alliance, we wish to join you, we are former Predacons, but the Preds kciked us out, we want revenge and we want to side with you! Sinesis

Sinesis waits.

"Alliance, we wish to join you, we are former Predacons, bu=
t the Preds kciked us out, we want revenge and we want to side with you!" S=
inesis said to the Alliance base...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From:=
 ilovealllizards 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, August 11, 2000=
 10:01 PM
  Subject: Re: Sinesis


  Twister

   
   
  Twister: "What do y=
ou expect me to say? It doesn't look like anyone wants us."

  *Twister sig=
hs and than thinks about something and starts laughing lightly but loud eno=
ugh for others to hear. She is thinking about what Sinesis said back at the=
 Predacon Base*

    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: THECODE 
    T=
o: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Friday, August 11, 2000 9:39 PM
    Subjec=
t: Re: Sinesis


    "Don't talk like that! We are not going to die!" Sines=
is said...
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: ilovealllizards =

      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Friday, August 11, 2000 8:38 PM
=
      Subject: Re: Sinesis


      Twister

      *Twister arives at the Al=
liance Base and stands next to Sinesis*

      Twister: "If they don't want=
 us than we shall join....."

      *Twister frowns and sits down on a rock=
*

      Twister: "Probably the Matrix."

      *Twister bares her teeth as=
 she stares at the Alliance Base*

        ----- Original Message ----- 
  =
      From: THECODE 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Friday, =
August 11, 2000 6:39 PM
        Subject: Re: Sinesis


        Sinesis igno=
res all food and walks toward the Alliance base, he arives...
          ---=
-- Original Message ----- 
          From: ilovealllizards 
          To: n=
bwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Friday, August 11, 2000 4:17 AM
        =
  Subject: Re: Sinesis


          Twister


          Twister: "We probabl=
y shouldn't mention food."

          *Twister says to Sinesis even tough f=
ood was racing in her mind. All she could see was Apples, oranges, peaches,=
 grapes, meat, coconuts, watermellon, chocolate and food she'd never seen b=
efore! It was dark raving MAD! Twister tries not to think of food but fails=
. She would probably eat a dead drone since she hadn't eaten anything since=
 she first arived!*

          Twister: "One potato, two potato, three pota=
to, once I walk trough that that door potatos no more!"

          *Twister=
 sings. She grabs her head and starts thinking of peaceful birds and frogs =
croaking and than a nice big fat juicy wild boar! Twister shakes her head a=
nd starts leaving her mind blank like a white sheet of paper while her stom=
ich growls and continues to follow Sinesis*
            ----- Original Mess=
age ----- 
            From: THECODE 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
 =
           Sent: Friday, August 11, 2000 3:12 AM
            Subject: Re: S=
inesis


            "I could go for some food right now." Sinesis said. He=
 looked on the ground as some ants walked by. He hadn't eaten anything in a=
 while, but he wasn't about to eat the ants...
              ----- Original=
 Message ----- 
              From: ilovealllizards 
              To: nbwr=
pg@egroups.com 
              Sent: Thursday, August 10, 2000 11:49 PM
    =
          Subject: Re: Sinesis


              Twister


              *Twi=
ster looks at the Predacon Base and than follows Sinesis*

              Tw=
ister: "I don't think we'll ever find a team that wants us, and pretty plea=
se with chocolate on top, don't give me a speech, I've had too many of thos=
e in my past."

              *Twister says to Sinesis as she follows him*
=

                ----- Original Message ----- 
                From: THECOD=
E 
                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                Sent: Thursday, =
August 10, 2000 11:05 PM
                Subject: Sinesis


               =
 Sinesis waits in front of the Predacon base.

                "That's it, =
Predacons, I'm taking my business somewhere else, you greedy incompetent sl=
agging piles!" Sinesis called. out. He looked at Twister and laughed. He di=
dn't know what he was saying until it came out. He walked away from the Pre=
dacon base...

------------------------------------------------------------=
----------------
